Expected Result Content: The login page should be displayed with username and password fields

Step Content: Enter valid username in the username field
Expected Result Content: The username should be accepted and displayed in the field

Step Content: Enter valid password in the password field
Expected Result Content: The password should be masked with asterisks
The user should be redirected to the dashboard
The products page should load with a search bar
The search term should appear in the search field
A list of laptop products should be displayed

Step Content: Add a product to the shopping cart
Expected Result Content: The product should appear in the cart with correct details

Step Content: Update the quantity of an item in the cart
Expected Result Content: The cart should reflect the new quantity and update totals

Step Content: Remove an item from the cart
Expected Result Content: The item should be removed and totals recalculated
The checkout page should load with cart summary
